TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed ToolTipService extends System.Object
public ref class ToolTipService abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示一个服务，该服务提供用于控制工具提示的显示和行为的属性和事件。

span.span: Represents a service that provides properties and events to control the display and behavior of tooltips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置或属性来定义元素的工具提示。You define a tooltip for an element by setting the or property. ToolTip 属性采用一个子级。The ToolTip property takes one child. 子字符串的内容可能会因简单文本字符串而异, 而不是具有嵌入文本和元素的更复杂的内容。The content of the child can vary from a simple text string to more complex content such as a that has embedded text and elements. 可以将工具提示内容定义为对象, 但这不是必需的。You can define tooltip content as a object, but this is not required. 如果不将 tooltip 内容定义为对象, 则可以使用属性来定位和自定义工具提示内容。When you do not define the tooltip content as a object, you can use the properties to position and customize the tooltip content. 类的附加属性用于确定工具提示的位置、行为和外观。Attached properties of the class are used to determine the placement, behavior, and appearance of a tooltip. 这些属性是在定义工具提示的元素上设置的。These properties are set on the element that defines the tooltip. 类和类共享许多用于自定义工具提示的相同属性。The class and the class share many of the same properties that are used to customize a tooltip. 如果同时设置了等效项和属性, 则属性优先。If equivalent and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 例如, 如果为对象设置了属性和属性, 则使用属性的值。For example, if both the property and the property are set for a object, the value of the property is used. 下面的计时属性仅针对类定义, 由所有工具提示使用:The following timing properties are only defined for the class and are used by all tooltips: - - - 有关如何处理在工具提示打开或关闭时发生的事件的信息, 请参阅和字段。For information about how to handle the events that occur when the tooltip opens or closes, see the and fields. 、 、、和 的行为类似于类中具有相同名称的属性。 , , , , and behave similarly to the properties of the same name in the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来指定工具提示的行为。The following example shows how the use the class to specify the behavior of a tooltip. 通过将类的属性直接附加到公开工具提示的元素来设置类的属性。You set the properties of the class by attaching them directly to the element that exposes the tooltip. [!code-xaml[ToolTipService#NoToolTip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#notooltip)]

summary.span: 获取或设置两个工具提示显示之间的最大时间（第二个工具提示不经延迟即会出现）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum time between the display of two tooltips where the second tooltip appears without a delay.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 当用户将鼠标指针移到具有工具提示的对象上时, 在显示工具提示之前存在延迟。Typically, when a user moves the mouse pointer over an object that has a tooltip, there is a delay before the tooltip is displayed. 此延迟等于属性的值。This delay is equal to the value of the property. 但是, 在显示工具提示后, 可以在不等待时间传递的情况下显示一个时间段。However, after a tooltip is displayed there is a period of time during which another tooltip can be displayed without waiting for the time to pass. 使用属性指定此时间段。You specify this time period by using the property. 当用户在此时间段内将鼠标从一个具有可见工具提示的元素移动到另一个具有工具提示的元素时, 不会应用第二个工具提示的属性的值, 并且会立即显示第二个工具提示。When the user moves the mouse within this time period from one element that has a visible tooltip to another element that has a tooltip, the value of the property for the second tooltip is not applied and the second tooltip appears immediately. 有关如何获取或设置此属性的信息, 请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set this property, see the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

span.span: The value of the property is less than zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和属性值提供对由属性和属性值定义的工具提示的位置的其他调整。 The property and the property values provide additional adjustment to the position of a tooltip that is defined by the property and the property values. 的行为类似于属性。 behaves similarly to the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `double` 大于或等于0.0 但小于的值的字符串表示形式。A string representation of a value that is equal to or greater than 0.0 but that is smaller than . 这被解释为与设备无关的单位 (1/96th 每英寸/单位) 度量值。This is interpreted as a device-independent unit (1/96th of an inch per unit) measurement. 字符串不必显式包含小数点。Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points. `qualifiedDouble` 一个值, 后跟以下单元声明字符串之一: `px`、 `in`、 `cm`、 `pt`。A value that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px`(默认值) 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in`为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm`为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt`为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 有关如何在代码中获取或设置此属性的信息, 请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set this property in code, see the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

summary.span: 获取或设置工具提示打开前的时间长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time before a tooltip opens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 当用户将鼠标指针移到具有工具提示的对象上时, 在显示工具提示之前存在延迟。Typically, when a user moves the mouse pointer over an object that has a tooltip, there is a delay before the tooltip is displayed. 此延迟等于属性的值。This delay is equal to the value of the property. 但是, 在显示工具提示后, 可以在不等待时间传递的情况下显示一个时间段。However, after a tooltip is displayed there is a period of time during which another tooltip can be displayed without waiting for the time to pass. 使用属性指定此时间段。You specify this time period by using the property. 当用户在此时间段内将鼠标从一个具有可见工具提示的元素移动到另一个具有工具提示的元素时, 不会应用第二个工具提示的属性的值, 并且会立即显示第二个工具提示。When the user moves the mouse within this time period from one element that has a visible tooltip to another element that has a tooltip, the value of the property for the second tooltip is not applied and the second tooltip appears immediately. 有关如何在代码中获取或设置此属性的信息, 请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set this property in code, see the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置计时属性。The following example shows how to set the timing properties. [!code-xml[ToolTipService#NoToolTip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipService/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#notooltip)]

span.span: The value of the property is less than zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定在打开控件时该控件所定位到的结构。 The property specifies a structure relative to which the control is positioned when it opens. 如果不`null`为,则相对于对象定义结构。If is not `null`, the structure is defined relative to the object. 否则, 将相对于屏幕的左上角定义指定的结构。Otherwise, the specified structure is defined relative to the upper-left corner of the screen. 如果将属性设置为, 则工具提示会相对于鼠标的位置显示, 并且属性的值不起作用。 If the property is set to , the tooltip is displayed relative to the location of the mouse, and the value of the property has no effect. 此属性为附加属性。This property is an attached property. 有关如何在代码中获取或设置此属性的值的信息, 请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. 的行为类似于属性。 behaves similarly to the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不必是在其上定义工具提示的对象。The does not have to be the object on which the tooltip is defined. 例如, 当用户将鼠标指针暂停在上时, 可通过描述来指定要在上显示的工具提示。For example, a that describes an could specify its tooltip to appear over the when the user pauses the mouse pointer on the . 如果未指定 , 并且 tooltip 具有视觉父级, 则视觉对象将充当。If you do not specify a and the tooltip has a visual parent, the visual parent acts as the . 如果工具提示没有视觉父级, 并且属性的值为`null`, 则工具提示控件的定位相对于屏幕的左上角。If the tooltip does not have a visual parent and the value of the property is `null`, the tooltip control is positioned relative to the upper-left corner of the screen. 此属性为附加属性。This property is an attached property. 有关如何在代码中获取或设置此属性的信息, 请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set this property in code, see the and methods. 的行为类似于属性。 behaves similarly to the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

summary.span: 获取或设置工具提示保持可见的时间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time that a tooltip remains visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义在用户将鼠标指针悬停在定义工具提示的对象上时, 工具提示保持可见的时间。This property defines the time that a tooltip remains visible while the user pauses the mouse pointer over the object that defines the tooltip. 如果用户将鼠标指针移出对象, 则工具提示将关闭。If the user moves the mouse pointer off of the object, the tooltip closes. 此属性为附加属性。This property is an attached property. 有关如何在代码中获取或设置此属性的值的信息, 请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置工具提示的属性。The following example shows how to set the property for a tooltip. summary.span: 获取或设置工具提示的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of a tooltip.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具提示内容可以从简单文本字符串到更复杂的对象 (例如具有嵌入控件和图像的元素) 范围。Tooltip content can range from a simple text string to more complex objects such as a element that has embedded controls and images. 但是, 工具提示内容无法获得焦点。However, tooltip content cannot take focus. 例如, 工具提示内的无法接收事件。For example, a inside a tooltip cannot receive a event. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供一个控件, 该控件定义工具提示并提供可用于指定工具提示行为的属性。provides a control that defines a tooltip and provides properties that you can use to specify tooltip behavior. 但是, 工具提示可以是任何元素, 例如 或。However, a tooltip can be any element, such as a or an . 此属性为附加属性。This property is an attached property. 有关如何在代码中获取或设置此属性的值的信息, 请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. 此处[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]所示的语法适用于填充工具提示的对象是具有本机类型转换的基元, 例如字符串。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax shown here is appropriate if the object that fills the tooltip is a primitive with native type conversion, such as a string. 如果对象不支持本机类型转换或支持其自己的类型转换器, 则您可能需要指定附加属性语法的详细形式, 如下所示:If the object does not support native type conversion or support its own type converter, you might need to specify a verbose form of attached property syntax as follows: ``` ``` 如果对象允许使用子元素, 则占位符元素*objectThatFillsTheToolTip*也可以有子元素。The placeholder element *objectThatFillsTheToolTip* could also have child elements, if that object permits them. 但是, 对此使用的需求应相对较少, 因为大多数[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用情况将改用公开的服务的实际控制实现。However, the need for this usage should be relatively rare, because most [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usages will instead use practical control implementations of the service that are exposed by . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定工具提示。The following example shows how to specify a tooltip by using the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件会在工具提示打开之前立即发生。The event occurs immediately before a tooltip opens. 如果未定义工具提示或者工具提示内容设置为 null, 则不会发生此事件。This event does not occur if the tooltip is not defined or if the tooltip content is set to null. 此字段为使用此服务的类注册事件的行为。This field registers the behavior of the event for classes that use this service. 和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 类都实现并通过访问器和公开此事件。 The and classes both implement the and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors and . 如果将工具提示指定为对象 , 则在工具提示打开时也会引发事件。If you specify the tooltip as a object, the event is also raised when the tooltip opens. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为事件设置事件处理程序。The following example shows how to set an event handler for the event. 在这种情况下, 事件处理程序实际上适用于, 因为附加了处理程序的是的派生类。In this case, the event handler is actually for , because the where the handler is attached is a derived class of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性为附加属性。This property is an attached property. 有关如何在代码中获取或设置此属性的值的信息, 请参阅和方法。For information about how to get or set the value of this property in code, see the and methods. 的行为类似于属性。 behaves similarly to the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `double` 大于或等于0.0 但 小于的值的字符串表示形式。The string representation of a value that is equal to or greater than 0.0 but smaller than . 这被解释为与设备无关的单位 (1/96th 每英寸) 度量。This is interpreted as a device-independent unit (1/96th inch) measurement. 字符串不必显式包含小数点。Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points. `qualifiedDouble` 一个值, 后跟以下单元声明字符串之一: `px`、 `in`、 `cm`、 `pt`。A value that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px`(默认值) 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in`为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm`为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt`为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|
